sourcesContent:
<script>
  export default {
    data: {
      loading: false,
      selection: 1,
    },
    methods: {
      reserve () {
        this.loading = true;
        setTimeout(() => (this.loading = false), 2000)
      }
    }
  }
</script>

<template>
  <v-card
    :loading="loading"
    class="mx-auto my-12"
    max-width="374"
  >
    <v-progress-linear
      color="deep-purple"
      height="10"
      indeterminate
    ></v-progress-linear>
    
        <v-col
          lg="12"
          sm="6"
          md="3"
        >
          <v-text-field
            label="Regular"
          ></v-text-field>
        </v-col>

  </v-card>
</template>
